Is Multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2A inherited ?,How is multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2A inherited? Multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2A (MEN 2A) is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern. A person with MEN 2A often inherits the altered RET gene from one parent with the condition.,GARD,Multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2A
